entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Terrace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:51 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Airport 11:18 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: N 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 20 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of ice pellets or snow or freezing rain in the morning. Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets and snow beginning in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:34 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 6:34 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
